name: Remove 3
description:
Welcome to install and pay this new game.
This is a similar traditional match-3 game, but it is more different. Eliminate three or more blocks of the same type by touching or sliding blocks.
Enjoy your time.

Credit:

This game is a free game, made by gamegostudio.
